embed.title: How to purchase a Robux Plan
embed.description:
**Warning: You will not be refunded unless your reason is in our refund policy.**
Please follow the below steps:

1️⃣ Create an Account – Sign up at [Breeze Billing](https://billing.breezehost.xyz) if you haven't already.

2️⃣ Send Us Your Email – Send us the email you used to register your account.

3️⃣ Choose Your Server Type – Let us know if you want a Python or JavaScript server and what plan tier you want for your bot. Our plans are listed in <#1285043972548595732> 

🔄  Renewing Your Plan – To renew, simply use https://roblox.breezehost.xyz. You can also prepay in advance for future renewals!
